history.text: Hi, this is one of my favorite movies!!
It looks like a good movie
It gets pretty good ratings
Have you not seen it? I love animated movies, are you familiar with the minions? They are the comic relief in the movie.
I think I saw most of it once on tv
I wouldnt go to a movie theater to see this movie
Aw it was really funny, alot of the humor was aimed at adults even though it was a kids movie.
I dont think I will go out of my way to see this movie
Ok, well I recommend this movie, what is the genre you prefer?
I would prefer action or drama something real
Oh, yeah you lost me there. I have taken niece and nephew and friends to see these movies, htere is humor in them for anyone.
I don't like to many newer movies made for kids they always have alot of cheesy comedy
Yeah they do, but I have a zany sense of humor. The whole franchise starting with this movie is very humorous, the animation is great. I love Steve Carell and he plays the main character.
this is a franchise they made more of these movies?
Yes, Despicable Me 2 &3, and also Minions, love those guys.
People will watch anything these days
Well aren't you a ray of sunshine? Trying to discuss this movie, which is the point to this conversation. I chose the movie because it was one I liked. Obviously you have no kids
I have a kid nice that you would assume otherwise because I dont like the one kid movie you choosed
Yes, like I said I am discussing this movie. I didn't realize that Russell Brand was a voice in this movie til I just read it
I am more of a Jason segel fan out of the three characters they have mentioned
Is there any females in this cast
How does one steal the great pyramid of giza ?

I do like Jason Siegal also, though I can't think of any other movies of his. Well, you're going to hate this. The Supervillan has a shrink ray. The pyramid was stolen and is replaced by a bouncy pyramid.
So what are they going to replace the moon with when they shrink it a block of cheese?
Not at all they were stealing it to hold it for ransom, because super villans had fallen on hard times like everyone else.
Was that 12??
Looks like they need a better shrink ray the on from honey i shrunk the kids might work
Ha funny,... Never saw that movie
So what happens after the moon returns to normal
Nothing the bad guys are stuck on it
Is that how the movie ends

uid2response.feedback: WAS THERE REALLY ANOTHER PERSON? They were quite insulting
